overview: Documentary about love motels in Miami's Little Havana. Guests deal with infidelity, addiction, and prostitution. The film is a candid & compassionate commentary on love, loss and the human condition.
tagline: Love at the Twilight Motel reveals a world of infidelity and delusion; filmmaker Alison Rose portrays a compassionate account of love, loss and the human condition.
title: Love at the Twilight Motel
